sqls.sql: SELECT is_exist, me_sn_no_rmk01, me_sn_no_rmk02, me_sn_no_rmk03, me_sn_no_rmk04, me_sn_no_rmk05, me_sn_no_rmk06, me_sn_no_rmk07, me_sn_no_rmk08, me_sn_no_rmk09, me_sn_no_rmk10, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host FROM me_sn_no WHERE me_sn_no = @me_sn_no OR me_sn_no_id = @me_sn_no_id;
DELETE FROM me_sn_no WHERE me_sn_no = @me_sn_no OR me_sn_no_id = @me_sn_no_id;
